song_name: WHITE CHRISTMAS -ホワイト・クリスマス-
lyrics: I'm dreaming of a White ChristmasJust like the ones I used to knowWhere the tree-tops glistenAnd children listenTo hear sleigh bells in the snowI'm dreaming of a White ChristmasWith every Christmas card I writeMay your days be merry and brightAnd may all your Christmases be white
